```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
# Read in projects csv file 
projects <- readr::read_csv(here::here("resources", "challenges.csv"))
```

```{r projects, echo=FALSE, layout="l-page"}
projects %>% 
  bs4cards::cards(
    link = url,
    image = src,
    layout = "image-only",
    tags = paste("All;", tags),
    border_radius = 2,
    border_width = 1,
    border_colour = "#394755",
    spacing = 5,
    width = 4,
  )
```
